name: TIME WÔRP (early demo)
description:
TIME WôRP is a racer game with puzzle/memory elements. This is an early form of the demo. First map is about 50% complete. Still a few core mechanics to finish as well.

My intention with TW was to develop a game that could be played on any device and that required one hand with very simple controls but ideally it would be quite difficult to get a passable score... "easy to play, difficult to master". 

browser based version here https://arcade.gamesalad.com/games/147977
